scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a chaotic battle with mounted warriors in ornate armor clashing amidst a multitude of foot soldiers. One warrior on a white horse is falling, his sword drawn, while another on a golden horse lunges forward. In the background, a city with distinct buildings, including gabled structures and towers, is visible under a stormy blue sky with streaks of rain. The ground is littered with fallen soldiers and weapons, suggesting a fierce and bloody conflict. The overall impression is one of intense warfare and the grim realities of battle.
